@SchrodingerZ "the famous <sexual training> takes place at the NTR. This is part of the empowerment fantasy that the NTR displays" That's not an empowerment fantasy...the boss is the villain, not the hero. The hero is depowered and made useless. It's the exact opposite of an empowerment fantasy. NTR is written for masochistic cucks...not for people that want a power fantasy.

If you really want to push reality into these kind of works the wife supposedly would have been in pain and mentally scarred since the very first time the dude blackmailed her. It's all for the sake of fiction and comparing reality with these kinds of works is extremely wrong, the premise might be similar but you can clearly tell that the characters are dumbed down. You think a husband wouldn't look for his wife (or a wife wouldn't look at his husband) after she disappears the whole night without reason? Let alone her vagina would be destroyed in the process of night one since she passed the fuck out and kept being raped. Plus the personality change? Come on lmao, what kind of sorcery is that. Whats embarassing is that I don't even am a NTR fan, and I don't like it, yet I'm the one having to explain this. This is pure fiction that has no logic whatsoever for the sake of the genre.

So when it comes to stuff like hentai I like some NTR (both netorare and netori), rape, mind break, etc. and not others and I don't really know why. But I think this one is honestly kind of sad because in in most NTR stuff we only see the guy who gets cucked in like 1 or 2 pages with the rest being the guy who cucks him. We don't see any sex or anything with the cucked guy and the girl. It usually just says something like they have been dating for a year or something but that's it. In this one, however, they are marriedand we see them have sex and we see the girl being satisfied sexually by her husband but that all goes away. We see that she is quite in love with him but then the husband's boss steals both her sexual love and (I think) her emotional love. It seems with the way the boss says that he's going to make her not care about her husband at all, even emotionally and the way it says she feels like she can "love her husband" in quotes makes me think the boss kept his word.

Their marriage might still be going fine now but it probably won't be after they have a couple of kids which are a lot of responsibility and she fails to care for them well enough because she's off fucking . Or when her husband wakes up in the middle of the night and sees that she's not there. Or he realized that she perhaps has started to act a bit strange. Or when she starts to fail to meet her husband's needs and instead of having dinner with him or going on a date with him every once in a while she is fucking his boss. They will probably get a divorce sooner rather than later but that would probably just make the husband lose even more.

Jokes aside, this is pretty depressing.
I had an older friend 25 yrs old who found out that his wife was fucking someone in his bedroom after he arrived early from a business trip, he was terribly depressed and they broke up. After that he has been drinking alot for weeks, I contacted him at times and we hung out together. I could see his happy face whenever we hang out but his eyes is full of sadness, sadly he commited suicide by hanging in his garage.
I cried so much, John was a really good person. Hes the one who taught me how to basketball and he also taught me some things in college. Because of his death I tried suicide but I remember his gentle voice resonating in my head "You have a great future ahead of you, keep dreaming and strive for success" 
When I remembered that I fell on my knees and cried so much 
And now Im gonna fulfil his expectations of me into reality. If you can hear me John. Thank you so much for being a good friend, when I die I hope thatwecanseeeachother again

The President gives her reasons/threatens her, and over time they are fucking regularly, he makes her beg, for what she has desired, and his size stretches her out to the point where she is unable to be satisfied by her husbando, she claims that she loves him but is sexually aroused by the President/Bastard, intially anyway, then over time, he shows her his "caring" side and she starts developing feelings for him, it's clear he has experience in this he even plays with the memory of how they met. The marriage isn't destroyed yet, the children look like the two men (husband and president) on purpose, another guy on here broke it down. They are there to show what will come which is the break down between the woman and her husband. It happens frequently in real life, woman intially believes she is dealing with an uncaring, sexually arousing bastard, he shows a caring side and she starts to develop feelings for him, it would not happen as quickly as mentioned but still occurs.

@SchrodingerZ

I see what you mean, the idea of him raping her into submission and destroying the marriage is possible but wouldn't pan out the way it did here, but that's not what the President did. He started off slowly by threatening her husbands job, in his position, he's well protected from any legal issues unless she had evidence, and has connections to make the husband suffer. She already has issues in the marriage and guilt, she paid for the house, and they're low on money, so she had to continue with the President. We also see how repressed she is sexually, afraid of husbando's judgement of her face when shes extremely aroused, this and the fact that she may have subconsciously been unsatisfied with her husbands size. There are many times where a woman will cheat on her husband despite the marriage seemingly going well, but this isn't a quick force fuck and leave, it's a slow psychological and strategic erosion of her mind to uncover her sexual desires. cont..
